The storm that was the minions moved swiftly out into the openness of
space and spread out. As if acting on one accord the group moved
quickly toward the luminary of the night skies ahead of them, the moon!
Boosters flared, and they soon disappeared from sight!


OOC: I am not sure what happened to Nighstrike or Darkfate during all
the commotion?? Airly did I misinterpret what your characters were
doing? I just want to close up any loose ends, and make sure any and
all got back to whatever positions they are suppose to be in. Minion
activity should be moving to the moon, unless some choose to go
elsewhere. 

Preston
(Da'minion)
